snippet: The Obama administration on Aug. 15, 2014, released the first Justice Department Office of Legal Counsel memo on killing Anwar Al Awlaki, an American citizen deemed a terrorist, without a trial. The once-secret February 2010 memo would later be...
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Aug. 15, 2014, released the first Justice Department Office of Legal Counsel memo on killing Anwar Al Awlaki, an American citizen deemed a terrorist, without a trial. The once-secret February 2010 memo would later be replaced by a lengthier version signed in July 2010. Both memos were made public, in redacted form, following Freedom of Information Act lawsuits by the New York Times and the American Civil Liberties Union.

headline.main: First Justice Department Memo on Killing Anwar Al-Awlaki
